description:
The Open Source npm desktop GUI.

ndm stands for "npm desktop manager"
A cross-platform GUI for npm built with web technologies.
With ndm you can manage npm, npm projects and packages straight from the couch.
ndm is packed up thanks to Electron and developed in HTML/CSS/JS powered by AngularJS, Sass and Pug.
CHANGELOG
- Bug fixing
- Tabs #181
- Open and browse and manage multiple projects at once.
